alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:32PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rapides and northwestern Avoyelles Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 432 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alexandria International Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Deville, Libuse, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Kingsville, Kolin, Holloway and Paradise. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 81 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
